description: The redevelopment of the Former United Dairies Depot, 2 Baring Road SE12 to provide 4 residential blocks, two to four storeys in height, comprising 6 one bedroom, 47 two bedroom, 15 three bedroom and 7 four bedroom units, incorporating balconies, private and communal amenity space, associated landscaping, highway works, boundary treatment, bin/recycling stores, 76 bicycles spaces and 29 car parking spaces, including 8 car parking spaces for the disabled and pedestrian and vehicular access from Baring Road.
